name: Swashbuckler's Curse
description:
Face the Swashbuckler's Curse !

You reached the Crimson Skull Island to find the treasure of the Ancient Times

You got trapped and cursed skeletons are now facing you.

Running away is not an option...


Features:

- 4 Weapons : Blunderbuss, Double Pistols, Sword and Cannon

- 4 Types of Enemies : the Sailor, the Watchman, the Captain & the Heavy Gunner


- Skeletons can be dismembered

Link for the Game Soundtrack : https://soundcloud.com/valerian-dubois/sets/swashbucklers-curse-soundtrack

Team:

- BOUVET Bilel : Game Designer/ Level Designer

- DUBOIS Valérian :  Game Designer / Sound Designer

- GUILLOT Nicolas : Lead Programmer

- NEGRONI Orso : Game Designer/ Game Programmer

- RONG Li :  Game Artist
